database.storageHint: Tracks and fingerprints will be stored in the selected database. Ensure sufficient space.
database.existingHint: If you already have a database, pick its manifest (.frkbdb). If missing, choose the legacy folder and it will be upgraded silently.
database.locationRetain: Current database stays at original path; you can delete it or keep using.
database.cannotRead: No FRKB database detected at this path, or the path is unavailable.
database.possibleDamage: Please select an existing FRKB database (.frkbdb), or choose a folder to create a new one.
database.initHintExisting: In the file picker, select the {manifestName} file to enter the existing database.
database.initHintCreate: Select a folder and enter the database name. A subfolder with that name will be created as the database.
database.selectFingerprintModeRequired: Please choose a fingerprint mode (PCM content hash or File hash)
database.invalidManifestFile: Not a valid FRKB database manifest
database.dirHasDatabase: The selected folder already contains a database.
database.dirHasDatabaseOptions: Confirm: enter as existing; Cancel: choose to reset to a brand-new database.
database.parentIsInsideDb: The selected parent path is inside an existing database. Creating a new one inside is not allowed. Please choose:
database.manifestAlreadyExists: FRKB.database (.frkbdb) already exists in this directory. You cannot create a new database here. Please select that file in 'Select existing database', or use an empty directory.
database.resetConfirm: Dangerous: this will clear the library and fingerprints, resetting to a brand-new database. Continue?
database.nonEmptyDirConfirm: The selected directory is not empty. Create a database here anyway? (Using an empty directory or a new subfolder is recommended)

cloudSync.needUserKeyBeforeDanger: You must configure userKey before performing this dangerous operation. Opening settings...

errors.sensitiveOperationTooFrequent: Sensitive ops too frequent. Try later.
errors.rateLimitWarning8: FYI: 8 syncs in 5 min. This is 9th. To avoid rate limiting, retry in {seconds}s
errors.rateLimitWarning9: FYI: 9 syncs in 5 min. This is 10th. Retry in {seconds}s
errors.limitExceeded: Server fingerprint quota exceeded (limit: {limit}). Sync aborted.
errors.limitExceededOnCheck: Would exceed server fingerprint quota (limit: {limit}). Sync aborted.

summary.analyze: Final total {final} would exceed the limit

reset.title: Dangerous: Reset cloud fingerprints
reset.description: This will delete ALL fingerprints and metas linked to current userKey on server (usage stats not reset). IRREVERSIBLE. Type DELETE to continue.

library.deduplicateHint: Compare with the fingerprint library; duplicates are skipped (even if previously deleted). When 'Delete after import' is enabled, duplicate files are moved to the Recycle Bin library.
library.deduplicateBatchHint: Analyze fingerprints for this batch and deduplicate within these files only; the existing fingerprint library is not consulted. When 'Delete after import' is enabled, duplicate files are moved to the Recycle Bin library.
library.deduplicateNoneHint: Do not deduplicate. If 'Add to fingerprint library' is enabled, fingerprints will be generated and added for imported tracks (they may be considered existing in later comparisons); otherwise, no fingerprints are written.
library.fingerprintHint: Generate and retain content fingerprints for imported tracks to support future deduplication; they remain even if the track is deleted.
library.nameInvalidChars: Name cannot contain: < > : " / \ | ? * or control characters
library.notExistOnDisk: This item is missing on disk; it may have been deleted.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.noTracksHint: Drop folders or audio files to import.

metadata.ffmpegFailed: FFmpeg failed to update metadata. Make sure the file is not locked and the format is supported.
metadata.fileNameExists: A file with the same name already exists in this folder
metadata.title: Title
metadata.label: Label
metadata.coverHint: Supports JPG/PNG/WEBP etc. Recommended under 2 MB.
metadata.coverHintWav: WAV specs cannot embed artwork; convert to another format if you need album art.
metadata.acoustidSettingDesc1: 1. Visit acoustid.org and sign in (create an account if you have none).
metadata.acoustidSettingDesc2: 2. After signing in, scroll down to “Create new application”, give it any name (e.g. FRKB on PC), submit and copy the 12-character Client Key.
metadata.acoustidSettingDesc3: 3. Paste the Client Key below and save.
metadata.acoustidSettingRateHint: The public key only allows about 3 requests per second for everyone combined. Ask each user to register their own Client Key to avoid throttling.
metadata.acoustidSetupDesc1: The Client Key is tied to your AcoustID account and can be reused on all of your devices.
metadata.acoustidSetupDesc2: Paste the 12-character key after registering and save to enable fingerprint matching.
metadata.acoustidMissingHint: AcoustID Client Key is required before running fingerprint matching.
metadata.acoustidKeyRequired: Please enter a valid Client Key.
metadata.acoustidKeySaveFailed: Failed to save the key. Please try again.
metadata.acoustidKeyInvalid: Client Key is invalid. Double-check the value or create a new application on acoustid.org.
metadata.acoustidKeyVerifyNetwork: Unable to verify the Client Key because of a network error. Please try again.
metadata.acoustidKeyVerifyTimeout: Client Key verification timed out. Please try again.
metadata.acoustidKeyVerifyUnknown: Failed to verify the Client Key. Please retry later.
metadata.trackNumberError: Track number must be a positive integer
metadata.trackTotalError: Total tracks must be a positive integer
metadata.discNumberError: Disc number must be a positive integer
metadata.discTotalError: Total discs must be a positive integer
metadata.musicbrainzHint: Search MusicBrainz with the current tags and fill the form quickly.
metadata.musicbrainzFingerprintIntro: When this tab is active, AcoustID fingerprint matching runs automatically with your Client Key. Configure it once here (or later in Settings) to reuse it.
metadata.musicbrainzNeedKeyword: Please provide at least one of title/artist/album before searching.
metadata.musicbrainzApplied: Fields filled in. Review before saving.
metadata.musicbrainzRateLimited: Too many requests, please try again later.
metadata.musicbrainzGenericError: Failed to load data from MusicBrainz.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdClientMissing: AcoustID Client Key is missing. Please configure it in Settings before running fingerprint matching.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdToolMissing: fpcalc was not found. Place the Chromaprint binary under vendor/chromaprint.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdFileMissing: Audio file not found; cannot generate fingerprint.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdAnalysisFailed: Fingerprint analysis failed; the format may be unsupported.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdTimeout: Fingerprint match timed out. Please retry.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdRateLimited: AcoustID requests are too frequent. Please retry later.
metadata.musicbrainzAcoustIdNetworkError: AcoustID network error. Please retry later.
metadata.acoustidSetupDesc3: Need to change it later? Open the Settings dialog and update the key there.
metadata.autoFillNeedSelection: Select at least one track before running auto-fill.

autoFillReason.NO_QUERY: Not enough tags to build a query
autoFillReason.FFMPEG_METADATA_FAILED: FFmpeg failed to write tags (often WAV or locked file)

metadata.autoFillFingerprintHintMissing: AcoustID Client Key is not configured, so this run will use text search only.
metadata.autoFillFingerprintHintGuide: Add your Client Key in Settings to enable fingerprint matches for more accurate results.

selection.bulkDoneWithErrors: Bulk update finished with errors (ok: {okBatches}, failed: {failedBatches}).

convert.title: Format conversion
convert.metadataHint: We’ll try to keep the tags, but some formats simply don’t support metadata.

player.hideControlsShowWaveform: Hide controls to show longer waveform
player.aiffNotSupported: AIFF/AIF format is not supported for playback
player.audioOutputDeviceUnavailable: The selected output device is unavailable. Reverted to system default.
player.audioOutputNotSupported: Output device switching is not supported in this environment.

fingerprints.importMergeHint: New fingerprints will merge into old.
fingerprints.exportHint: Exported file can be merged on other devices via 'Import fingerprint DB file'.
fingerprints.analysisHint: Analyze all audio in folder/subfolders; store results only; no file changes.
fingerprints.modeFileHint: Calculates on whole file. Fastest but cannot ignore noise; same song with different covers will be treated as different.
fingerprints.modeIncompatibleWarning: Two fingerprint libraries are fully isolated and do not interoperate; switching only affects future analysis and won't migrate/merge history.
fingerprints.noEligibleTracks: Selected items do not contain analyzable audio files.

selectionTraining.confirmClear: This will remove all Like/Dislike labels, audio features, and path index, and delete the trained local prediction model. Continue?

import.waitForTask: Please wait for the current task

update.networkIssue: Network issue. Check connection or use a proxy.
update.downloadCompleted: Download done. FRKB will update after restart.
update.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded. FRKB will upgrade next start.

whatsNew.title: FRKB Release Notes
whatsNew.subtitle: Published: {date}
whatsNew.noChangelog: This release does not provide changelog details

shortcuts.shortcutSetFailed: Failed to set shortcut. May conflict.
shortcuts.playerGlobalShortcutsHint: These combos still work even if the app is minimized.
shortcuts.globalPlayerShortcutHint: Shift + Alt + Arrow is the default combo—you can customize it anytime in Settings.

playlist.deduplicateConfirm: We will analyze this playlist using the current fingerprint mode (content hash / file hash) and move duplicates to the recycle bin. Continue?

about.author: Author: Coder 'Programmer/DJ'
about.prereleaseHint: This is a pre-release build. May be unstable. Please use with caution or download the stable version.

errorReport.hint: Only crash and error logs are uploaded. No user data is included.

errors.diskFullInterruptedHint: Insufficient space. Completed {0}, pending {1}. Free space then retry or skip the rest.

filters.noResultsHint: Try widening conditions or clear filters.

settings.showPlaylistTrackCount: Show track count after playlist name

songListBubble.title: Track row bubble tooltip
songListBubble.overflowOnly: Show only when text is truncated
songListBubble.hint: Controls how tooltips show in track lists

fileSelector.title: Select Files/Folders
fileSelector.helpText: Click to select/deselect items, double-click folders to navigate, Enter to confirm, Esc to cancel
fileSelector.name: Name
